A patent application, filed by the People's Liberation Army University of Defence Technology was published, titled "IOTA-based PKI authentication system and method", mentioning #IOTA (304x)  https://t.co/DdbKHtmUs9  Found by: The Librarian

#IOTA #coordicide is the #BlackSwanEvent for the #cryptocurrency industry. But let's call it a #WhiteSwanEvent, because everyone (besides the mining industry) will benefit from a feeless, permissionless a. scalable #DLT. #IOTA will solve the trust problem of the Internet a. #IOT

Quotes by @DomSchiener: "With #Chrysalis Phase 2 we are ensuring the ecosystem, it is time to start building on #IOTA. [...] After #Coordicide we will have the best #DLT technology out there. [...] The IOTA token needs to be the backbone of the machine economy."
